title: Stacked bar chart
description: Creates a bar chart with multiple stacked bars in each category

title.title: Chart ID
title.description: Identifies the chart in the document. Cannot contain spaces or special characters. Example: Chart description - 'Funding by area'; Chart ID - 'funding-area'

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Chart description (caption) explaining what the chart is showing. Will display as a heading before the chart graphic.

chartHeight.title: Chart height
chartHeight.description: Height of the chart as percentage of its width (i.e. 120 will make the chart taller than it's wide)

range.title: Data range
range.description: [optional] the maximum value shown by the gridlines of the chart. Defaults to the maximum value in the dataset.

gridLinesCount.title: Number of gridlines
gridLinesCount.description: Number of horizontal grid lines with matching y-axis labels.

yLabel.title: Y-axis Label
yLabel.description: (optional) Appears on the left side of the chart

value.title: Chart data
value.description: This is a list of items, each representing a stack of bars in the bar chart.

items.title: Bar stack
items.description: A stack of bars, showing multiple values in the same category.

title.title: Category title
title.description: This is the x-axis label of the bar stack.

value.title: Values
value.description: A list of multiple values adding up to a whole

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The text to put in front of the numbers, e.g. currency sign.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The text to put after the numbers, e.g. units or % sign

color.title: Colors
color.description: List of bar colors, must be in the same order as the numbers.

auxiliary.title: Auxiliary dataset
auxiliary.description: An additional list of values that appears as a segmented line over the bar chart.

title.title: Dataset title
title.description: Label of the whole aux dataset.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The text to put in front of the numbers, e.g. currency sign.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The text to put after the numbers, e.g. units or % sign

legend.title: Legend [optional]
legend.description: The legend (key) of the chart. Will show under the chart normally, and next to it in expanded mode. Some charts will generate their keys automatically, this allows us to override them.
